properties.areaDesc: Jefferson; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Meagher
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 30 at 9:20AM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph
possible. Strongest winds and wind gusts at and near pass level.

* WHERE...Central and Southern Lewis and Clark, Jefferson and
Meagher.

* WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds may blow down limbs, trees, and power
lines. A few local power outages are possible. Travel may become
difficult, especially for high-profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and dry conditions in the
valleys may cause increased grassland fire danger Friday night
through Saturday.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
